name: cant touch this
description:
a game about a gamepad that doesn't like to be touched.

made in 24 hours by theo triantafyllidis

How to Play:

press buttons on a gamepad (gamepad required)

destroy the hand

Downloads:

Windows Build - Tested and working with a generic usb game controller

OSX Build - Not tested, try it out and let me know if it works :-)

Unity source files for the controller included. Use freely!
